sentences.en: A clearly defined track now leads down to the valley.
sentences.cn: 眼前有一条清晰可辨的小径通向山谷。

sentences.en: a steep mountain track
sentences.cn: 陡峭的山路

sentences.en: Across the river the railway track ran up to the pithead.
sentences.cn: 铁轨跨过这条河直达矿井口。

sentences.en: Anthony picked himself up and set off along the track.
sentences.cn: 安东尼自己慢慢爬起来，又开始沿着跑道跑下去。

sentences.en: Better driv-ing equipment will improve track adhesion in slippery conditions.
sentences.cn: 较好的驾驶设备能够提升在湿滑路面上的抓地力。

sentences.en: Denver has the inside track among 10 sites being considered.
sentences.cn: 丹佛在10个被考虑的地点之中具有优势。

sentences.en: Dozens of miles of railway track have been torn up.
sentences.cn: 好几十英里的铁轨被毁坏了。

sentences.en: formulas for keeping the economy on track.
sentences.cn: 保持经济正确发展的方案。

sentences.en: He was on the track of an escaped criminal.
sentences.cn: 他正在追踪一名逃犯。

sentences.en: It's so easy to lose track of who's playing who and when.
sentences.cn: 很容易就忘记谁要和谁比赛，什么时候比。

sentences.en: Much of the track had become overgrown with hawthorn.
sentences.cn: 小路上很多地方都长满了山楂树。

sentences.en: Police are on the track of (= searching for) the thieves.
sentences.cn: 警察正在追踪窃贼。

sentences.en: Police have been tracking the four criminals all over Central America.
sentences.cn: 警方一直在中美洲到处追捕这四名罪犯。

sentences.en: Police keep track of the kidnapper using electronic surveillance equipment.
sentences.cn: 警方利用电子监视设备跟踪绑架者。

sentences.en: she had lost all track of time and had fallen asleep.
sentences.cn: 她完全不知道时间，并且已经入睡了。

sentences.en: She selected a low gear and started down the track carefully.
sentences.cn: 她选了低速挡小心翼翼地沿小径下行。

sentences.en: stopped him right in his tracks.
sentences.cn: 当场制止了他

sentences.en: The company has a track record of good employee relations.
sentences.cn: 公司有员工关系良好的记录。

sentences.en: The dogs tracked the wolf to its lair.
sentences.cn: 那群狗循着狼的足迹一直追到它的巢穴。

sentences.en: The job needs someone with a good track record in investment.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要有良好投资业绩的人来担当。

sentences.en: The only evidence of pandas was their tracks in the snow.
sentences.cn: 有熊猫活动的惟一证据就是它们在雪中的足迹。

sentences.en: The road leading to the farm was little more than a dirt track .
sentences.cn: 只有一条烂泥小路通往农场。

sentences.en: The track led through dense forest.
sentences.cn: 小径穿过茂密的森林。

sentences.en: The track was damaged in several places.
sentences.cn: 铁轨有几处毁损。

sentences.en: The tracks, which looked like a fox’s, led into the woods.
sentences.cn: 这些足迹看着像是狐狸留下的，一直通向树林里。

sentences.en: The two men turned to watch the horses going round the track.
sentences.cn: 那两个男人转身观看赛马沿赛道而行。

sentences.en: To run a mile, you have to run four circuits of the track.
sentences.cn: 跑一英里要绕跑道四圈。

sentences.en: Turner immediately &B{stopped dead in his tracks}.
sentences.cn: 特纳立即就地停住。

sentences.en: we are on the right track for continued growth.
sentences.cn: 我们走的是持续增长的正确路线。

sentences.en: We climbed up a winding track towards a mountain refuge.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着一条蜿蜒的小道爬向山上的一处避难所。

sentences.en: We followed the tyre tracks across a muddy field.
sentences.cn: 我们顺着车辙穿过一块泥泞的田地。

sentences.en: Which of you boys tracked mud all over the kitchen floor?
sentences.cn: 你们这些男孩，是谁把厨房地上踩得到处都是泥巴？

words.tran_cn: 无路的；无足迹的；不在轨道上行驶的
追踪；追查；描摹；摹图；显迹
拉纤者，纤夫；追踪系统，[自] 跟踪装置；追踪者
铁路,公路,小路,人行道,小巷
追踪；通过；循路而行；用纤拉

phrases.tran_cn: 重回正轨；重上轨道；改过自新
双声道，双声轨（录音磁带）
循着正确（或错误）的路线
正确地；走对路了；未离题的
在正道上；未离题（或目标）；正确
竞赛的跑道；跑道形电磁分离器

phrases.phrase: the wrong side of the tracks

phrases.tran_cn: (澳，非正式)保持浪漫关系；保持性关系
n. 径赛成绩记录；过去的成绩或成就
（经过彻底、复杂的搜查而）跟踪找到；追查到；搜寻到
轨道系统；追踪系统；薪金线制度；分轨制
（小跑中的马）使马身后部有足够的冲力，后蹄能踏上或超过前蹄曾踩踏过的地方

trans.tran_cn: 小道，跑道，铁轨，站台，歌曲，音轨，足迹，路径，班级，滑轨，履带
trans.tran_en: a narrow path or road with a rough uneven surface, especially one made by people or animals frequently moving through the same place
a line of marks left on the ground by a moving person, animal, or vehicle
Tracks are marks left in the ground by the feet of animals or people

trans.tran_cn: 跟踪，追踪…的动向，跟踪摄影，留下足迹，探究，按能力分组
trans.tran_en: to search for a person or animal by following the marks they leave behind them on the ground, their smell etc
